channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China’s Russian Town Has Log Cabins and Cyrillic Signs, but No Russians
item.description: Enhe was once home to thousands of ethnic Russians. Under Xi Jinping’s push for ethnic unity, little remains beyond nostalgia and props for tourists.

item.title: Who is María Corina Machado, Venezuela's Nobel Peace Prize winning opposition leader?
item.description: The United States has captured Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro. Opposition leader María Corina Machado has been one of his biggest critics.
